item.description:
Many of you know that I've been doing personal growth work with the Human Awareness Institute for almost 8 years now and it has substantially changed my life.  When I began in 2003, I was in a relationship that was stifling my creativity -- my vital life force energy.  I didn't know the difference between intimacy and sex.  And although I wanted to express myself deeply and authentically, I didn't know how without fear of hurting someone. I wanted people to like me and did whatever I could to make sure they did!  Ouch!! I was living in a small box on overdrive not really knowing where to turn.  I saw a flyer on a bulletin board about a workshop that was happening the weekend of my birthday.  And I decided that was a sign....and I signed up! My life has never been the same.  

 

On a daily basis, I experience a deep satisfaction and happiness about my life, my work and my relationships with others.  I have the tools I need to create what I want in my life. I feel empowered to make changes, ease in my connections, and creative in my work and life.

 

If you want to feel any of these, and do not, please join me at this free workshop, led by a colleague of mine, Glenn Bigonet. I will be there and will be available to support you.  

 

Discover how your beliefs about love, intimacy and sexuality affect your life every day: your friendships, relationships, sexual satisfaction, health, body image, ability to find love.

 

The Human Awareness Institute workshops are about: 


* Letting go of the obstacles that are in the way of a joyful, blissful life
* Discovering greater depths with those you love
* Finding love, being honest and creating intimacy
* Creating the relationships you’ve always wanted * Healing from the inside out 



In this free mini-workshop, you’ll have the opportunity to discover what it is you are missing in your life and whether a HAI workshop will support you in getting what you want in your life.

 

 You'll have the opportunity to connect with others through verbal sharing and exercises designed to open your heart. Come and get a taste of what you’ve been craving, in a totally safe, non-sexual environment. The event is free, and the people are wonderful. All that’s missing is YOU!



The Human Awareness Institute (HAI) welcomes singles, couples, traditional and non-traditional relationships, without regard to sexual choices or preferences.

 

(btw, there's no hard sell at these free workshops -- you'll know if signing up is right for you and we can support you in doing that; if not, we hope that you leave with some very specific tools that will support you in moving your life forward in the way that you want it to.)
item.name: Deepening Intimacy: Learning and Implementing the Tools
